website_summaries.verdict: A supportive mattress for larger sleepers that is firm enough to help relieve back pain.
pros: A high-density foam base provides firm underlying support and helps this mattress last longer, while two top layers of cool gel foam make it comfortable for those who sleep hot
Extra-thick profile (14 inches high) is Certipur-US certified
Users with back pain find it firm yet comfortable
cons: Mattress tends to soften in the middle after two to three years

customer_reviews.title: Avoid!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product is unusable. It is supposed to expand to 14”. Both ends reach around 12” and the middle is at around 8” after 72 hours! Amazon says they have to have it back before they refund for the purchase. UPS refuses to pick it up! Amazon is no help. This entire experience has been very inconvenient!
customer_reviews.author: Rich Rowbotham

customer_reviews.title: Check under the mattress
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and supportive mattress, but didn't actually come with the 2 free pillows. Edit: I'm an idiot. For almost 3 weeks we were sleeping on the pillows. They were UNDER the mattress the entire time and we were wondering why it seemed bowed in the middle. Just found them. The mattress is much more comfortable now lol.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: totally sinking in it, BEWARE THERE ARE NO RETURNS
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT IT THINKING ITS A FIRM MATTRESS HAVING BUNCH OF GOOD REVEIWS , NOW ITS NOT AT ALL FIRM , U JUST SINK IN IT , WHEN U SIT OR WHEN U SLEEP . I WANTED TO RETURN IT , IT CAME COMPRESSED IN A BOX AND NOW THERE IS NO RETURN SERVICE FROM THE SELLER, SO ITS REALLY REALLY VERY DIFFICULT TO GET RID OF IT. PLEASE DONT BUY IT ,IF U DO U LL HAVE TO TRASH IT OR DONATE IT, DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Umair

customer_reviews.title: Very stiff
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this mattress. It was very soft and plush while it was expanding, but now it’s just hard as a rock. I barely sink into it. I wake up 5-6 times a night tossing and turning with horrible back pain. While it’s advertised as “plush” once it fully expands, it’s like sleeping on a board *UPDATE* 6/1/2019 I’ve grown to love this mattress. It expands to a very firm yet plush feel. You don’t sink in or leave a human sized hole when morning comes. Bought this over a year ago and still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A.

customer_reviews.title: Sleep perfect again!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is amazing. I almost bought a $3000 bed and this one feels as good possibly better. The only downside is you get this compressed and wrapped up. Just be prepared to have help unboxing it and getting it set up on your bed. It instantly took shape at the first tear in the plastic wrap. So you have to move fast. Lol. Slight odor which is normal. Expanded to full 14 inches in 15 seconds. Amazing comfort. It is firm with a cloud softness feeling. Total support for side sleepers for sure. I wrote this review without being paid or encouraged. I was skeptical at the thought of a mattress being compressed and shipped. Pleasantly pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Vader37

customer_reviews.title: Good if you have handicaped bars to get you out.
customer_reviews.text: Too mushy soft. Sleeping in this is like sleeping in quicksand. If you have handle bars hanging from the ceiling, you might be able to get yourself out. Even my son who is 127 lbs had a hard time. He did not like it either. On a positive note, because I have to try so hard to get myself out its toning my muscles up.
customer_reviews.author: Sariah

customer_reviews.title: Cool It Is Not
customer_reviews.text: The name of the mattress may be a little misleading, this bed is not cool. However, it is one of the most comfortable mattresses I have ever slept on. It arrives very tightly wrapped in industrial plastic, and in a box. It is very heavy, and you will need two people to place the mattress. I let my mattress sit and fully inflate for about 24 hours before I slept on it. I have slept on the mattress for about 3 months, other than it being much warmer than a traditional mattress, it is absolutely fantastic. The Memory foam is soft, and yet the bed is firm, I think it was a great buy, and I would do it again.
customer_reviews.author: sj

customer_reviews.title: I had it upside down
customer_reviews.text: For those complaining about firmness make sure you have it right side up - the flowery quilt design should be on top and the badging that says cool should be right side up and at your feet. The reason I had it upside down was because the two pillows that come in the package were sealed at the bottom so I assumed that was the way to unpack it and then it expanded when I lay it upside down. Will update review in a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Buying a mattress online can be really tricky! After searching long and hard, this was the one that we went with. I am so glad that we chose this mattress. It is super soft and comfortable. It feels like a memory foam mattress, and is soft but offers firm support while you’re sleeping. It has that plush kind of feeling. Some people say it’s super firm, I disagree. A firm mattress is one that really feels like it doesn’t have much give. This mattress will form to your body, providing support in any position. It is absolutely amazing! When people come over, and they sit on the bed they immediately wanna just lay down because it’s so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering the king size mattress. We refused the first one because it came in a damaged box, when the second one arrived, it did not come in a box but had a piece of cardboard with our address (mattress was wrapped in plastic). We opened the plastic and there were greasy/grime stains on the side of the mattress and on the top of the mattress...We had ordered a full size mattress two months ago and was so pleased, but for some reason the king size mattress and this experience has been poor.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy T

customer_reviews.title: Best bed I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I ran a home furnishing company for 20 years and sold tons of beds. We have tried several beds over the years and this mattress is by far the best mattress I have ever slept on. Ours is pretty firm which I love we do use 100% cotton sheets to help the bed breath and the pillows are awesome I love mine, but my wife wasn't a fan of the pillows she thought they were to hard. Just pull the trigger and get this bed it's worth every penny. We used to own a $3000 mattress and this bed in my opinion blows our old one out of the water.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Price

customer_reviews.title: Sinks a lot!!!! Too soft!!!
customer_reviews.text: It sinks A LOT!!!! Impossible to use this mattress for me. It might be okay for back sleepers, because the weight is more evenly distributed. But it's awful for side sleepers because the hips sink so much that gives me back pains. For me this is not even close to medium-firm. There's no support at all on the edges. It's the softest bed I've slept in my life. My husband also disliked it for being way too soft and also woke up with back pains. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: leah

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: We purchased. In less than 3 years it went from firm to ultra-soft. Destroyed my back to the point of needed to see doctor and cannot sleep on it. Warranty NOT honored by company. AND AMAZON will not stand behind its endorsement of the company. Waste of money and very disappointed in Amazon, their endorsement was what led me to buy this piece of excrement.
customer_reviews.author: Mikhael E Weitzel

customer_reviews.title: zero cool gel whatever they call it experience
customer_reviews.text: Mattress arrived on time, Didn't smell like chemicals, As far as comfort it is definitely a little on the soft side (even with memory foam if you want firm this is not the mattress for you), my issue is I am NOT experiencing any type of cool mattress that they advertised. The mattress will retain your body heat overall I am still sleeping about the same as I was on a regular mattress. (as a side note The free pillows just flatten right out when you put your head on them.)
customer_reviews.author: MarcT

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful night sleep!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love my bed! I have double scoliosis and this is the first bed that I have comfortably slept in my entire life. It's not too soft and not too hard. It's perfect to ease into after a long day. No pressure on my hips and it's just heavenly on my back. My husband is 300+ pounds and it holds up very well under his weight and pops back to normal as soon as he gets up in the morning. The only thing that could be better for me is the cooling effect. It's still a bit warm for me. I purchased the California King.
customer_reviews.author: MrsMTrl

customer_reviews.title: cool and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I've been sleeping on this for a month now and very happy with my purchase. This replaced a standard memory foam mattress which got miserably hot for me in the middle of the night. I wouldn't call the mattress "cooling" as much as "heat resistant" - which is fine by me as I don't wake up at 3am overheating. I was considering the WAY more expensive TempuPedic Cooling bed ($5K+!!) - a friend recommended I try this brand and glad she did. Feel is medium-firm (perfect for me) - I'm a side sleeper. Mattress came with two pillows (I assume made of the same material) which are too firm for my tastes. (but my cat loves them) :-)
customer_reviews.author: MUNKJC3

customer_reviews.title: Firm mattress .. seemingly quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 2.0 classic brands 14 inch mattress. Its very firm. I believe it's a high quality bed, however it's too firm for my 5 ft 2 in 130lb body. I wake with shoulder pain. I am returning it and trying for extra plush. The rating on this mattress said medium plush.. for me it was definitely FIRM. I slept on it for 2 weeks and customer service via Amazon has been good so far. They are coming to take the mattress on aug 5th. I will order something else and try again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine F

customer_reviews.title: 👎🏼 King Mattress
customer_reviews.text: Overtime I have actually purchase 7 mattresses from this company (2 twin 1 full 3 queen & a king). Six were 5 star quality EXCEPT FOR THE KING! I’ve had this mattress 3 months and its breaking down up under me. I normally sleep on the edge of the bed. That area has gotten soft so I keep moving toward the center of the mattress seeking a firmer spot. This should NOT have happen in 90 days Because of my past experience with this manufacturer I honestly believe the king I got is just a “lemon”.
customer_reviews.author: MsTee858

customer_reviews.title: No more back pain.
customer_reviews.text: This bed immediately expanded when opened. Within a few hours it was up to 12 inches. We let it sit over night and part of the next day and It was fully 14 inches. This is the 1st time in a long time that I haven't woken up with back pain. My husband is a large man and he barely makes a dent in the mattress. I look forward to more restful sleeping. As long as u let b it sit for the recommended time to fully expand it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress ever
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in October 2017. So this is a long term review. This is by far the most comfortable mattress I’ve ever slept on. More comfortable than any hotel bed. My back doesn’t hurt anymore. If my husband rolls over at night it no longer wakes me. I have been pleasantly surprised that mattress has worked out so well since there was no way to test it before purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M.

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable at all. Wish I could return it.
customer_reviews.text: It took me a little while to write about this mattress as I felt I needed to adjust to it ...but after 3 months I can truly say it’s very uncomfortable, it gives me neck and shoulder aches and numbness. It’s a bit too late to return and I truly wish I hadn’t thrown my old mattress out. ..... Update. Amazon reached out with a number to reach the company. I spoke with someone who offered to send a 'topping that may aid with giving comfort, that was a month ago, the product never arrived and the contact number no longer works. I dread going to bed and will now have to purchase another mattress.
customer_reviews.author: California living

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING Bed
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for beds for weeks because we wanted to move up from a Queen to King. Everything memory foam was $1,500 or more. I found this bed, the reviews were great so we took the chance! I was nervous because it was so much less than similar mattresses. It came in a long box, all rolled up as normal. It was quite heavy but, we moved it fine. There was no odor at all when we opened it and it "inflated" or "puffed" up just fine. We have had this for several months and it's just awesome, I would recommend this bed, in any size, to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Pagels

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: I looked at SO many different mattresses before deciding on this one for our king size platform bed. The price is GREAT! The mattress is GREAT! The pillow are GREAT! Truly don't understand the negative reviews. No weird/musty/chemical smell either. We slept on it the first night it arrived, and it was still GREAT! Very plush yet firm, and very comfortable!!! 10/10 would recommend, and would buy again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hammon

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: Beyond ecstatic with this purchase! Exceeded all expectations and I'm very picky. You need to know the 14 inch is FIRM but a very comfortable firm. If you're looking for a mattress you'll sink down into, this isn't for you. I want more pillows! Someone please tell me where I can purchase these pillows!! I shopped and priced out hundreds of mattresses for over a month and I'm very pleased I chose this amazing mattress and pillows!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: So far perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just received it this morning at 7am and by 930a I was napping til 12p. It's super comfortable and my guess is after all the complaints about packaging they decided to up the ante. Mine came wrapped in two plastics one that was vacuum sealed and double wrapped and then another thicker double wrap plastic. It came in box as well. The bed inflated instantly after removing the vacuum seal packaging and within 5 minutes it reached 14 inches. I tried it out and it was perfect. Firm where you want it to be, soft and plush where need be. I will return for an extensive review in a few weeks
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mattress!!
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo comfortable! I've been disabled for several years due to a degenerative bone disorder. I spent quite a large sum on a sleep number bed several years ago. I rarely have a regular sleep pattern. I sometimes go days without sleeping! I decided to get another adjustable frame with a gel mattress...I absolutely love it! The only negative is the odor, which dissipated in about 48 hours. I'm going to give this mattress a six month trial, after which I think I'll replace all the mattresses in my house. I'll update this if there's any change.
customer_reviews.author: Momof5

customer_reviews.title: FIBERGLASS MATTRESS DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: !!!!!!!!!!!!DO NOT BUY THIS MATTRESS!!!!!!!!!!!! !!!!!!!!!FIBERGLASS!!!!!!! We bought mattress loved it was super comfy! Used for a year , one day we realize there was fiberglass all over us and our clothes and bedding , we track it back to this mattress and found that it contains fiberglass and it had worked through the cover and we have had to throw several clothes and bed items away and our childerns clothes!!!!!!!! I would never ever ever ever buy this mattress or advise anyone else to!!!! Only gave one star because it made me!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I can honestly say that I’m impressed with how well my husband and I are sleeping on our new mattress. We were quoted over $6,000 for a tempurpedic. Aside from crapping myself, at the thought of spending that much on a bed, we took a chance on this one. Our 6 year old pillow top was beat! The only thing that I don’t like is the “odor” of the mattress. We have had it out of the box for 4 days now, and I’m hoping it goes away. Will follow up in a few months with updated review. So far, it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mattress at an amazing price.
customer_reviews.text: First off, we bought this to replace our name brand mattress that we paind $1200 for less than a year ago. We HATED that expensive mattress from the get go, but we didn't want to shell out that kind of money again for fear we would end up with something else we didn't like. So we took a chance on this mattress. So far we LOVE it. It is high quality and definitely cooling. I will say it is VERY firm. I'm ok with this because I prefer a firm mattress, but if you don't it may not be the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey_lou

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bed!
customer_reviews.text: Our old mattress was only 2 years old. We upgraded from a queen to a king. Our previous bed was a similar type but not the same brand. We loved the affordability. We bought the 14 inch king size bed. Read a ton of reviews on this one good and bad. We have no issues and it was perfect. The two pillows that came with it are pretty nice as well. Husband is 230lbs and I'm normally 115. Currently very pregnant and find a ton of relief laying in this bed. I do not have problems rolling over or adjusting.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea  Henry

customer_reviews.title: Best BANG for your buck. 👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this bed more stars. It has surpassed all my expectations. Having the best sleep I’ve had in years. This bed fully supports a wide range of sleeping and sexual positions, from laying on your back to upright on all fours this bed contours to fit you perfectly. Whether your curled up with a nice book or hanging off the edge being plowed from behind you’ll notice immediate quality comfort like no other. Highly recommend. Shipped in perfect condition, after only 24 hours it was fully expanded and ready to go. Ready to go all night long. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Ashley A.

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!!
customer_reviews.text: There must be quality issues with these - I read a lot of reviews and some people love them and others say they are hard as a brick while yet others that they feel like they are sinking in mud. Put me into the final category! Plus that chemical smell can't be good for anything. I know the smell might go away, but the chemicals aren't. I have contacted Amazon about returning this, but how can I decompress this thing back into the original box to be picked up by UPS?! Very disappointed with this situation.
customer_reviews.author: DANN

customer_reviews.title: It is not as as hard as some reviewers' review. Don't open bed until you are sure of the direction.
customer_reviews.text: It's comfortable enough right now as far as mattress density is concerned, but I am afraid it may overtimes will sink down. It's not as hard as some reviews' posted. Before opening the plastic wrap, make sure to face the bottom and topside in the right direction. Don't rely on video instruction or written instruction that came with the bed. I follow video instruction, it was wrongly instructed. And once the plastic is cut, the bed rises up quickly and it isn't easy to flip the opened king-size gel-infused memory bed. The package came torn and open, but the mattress wasn't damaged. Thank goodness for that. This (memory bed ) would be a nightmare to return them.
customer_reviews.author: PoochMania

customer_reviews.title: I keep oversleeping my alarms.
customer_reviews.text: 5th time I was late to work today. My boss said that if I'm late one more time, I will be laid off. I 100% blame this bed as I never want to leave and easily fall right asleep right after I press the snooze button. If you like comfortable mattresses that let you fall asleep in them quickly, get this mattress. If you don't want to keep being late for work cause your bed is too comfortable, then this inst for you.
customer_reviews.author: Minh-Kha V.

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this mattress
customer_reviews.text: We have had this mattress from almost 2 years, and I wanted to wait that long to make a final review. I thought it was doing a good job for my pressure points and back pain, but it seems to have softened to the point I am back where I started. It does keep us cooler than our old foam mattress, but over all, we Slept on a coil mattress last week on vacation, and I could immediately tell it was better on my back.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly L.

customer_reviews.title: I Once Was Blind But Now I See!!!
customer_reviews.text: Me and my wife were in need of a new bed/mattress and this one is a Godsend! Ignore all the naysayers comaining of this mattress being too firm; it's memory foam, it shapes and contours to your body. It's also shock absorbant, so if you or the wife want to sneak out for a while, it won't disturb the other's sleep. Make sure you use jersey knit bedding to allow for the "coolness" factor. Buy this mattress, then after you buy it, tell another couple to buy it too.
customer_reviews.author: Little Commandlet

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bed. Everything is described accurately
customer_reviews.text: This bed is great, arrived in perfect condition and is everything that was advertised. Sometimes I think people either get defective products or don't know how to set this up properly when they write these bad reviews. Bed is comfortable. It expanded within 20 minutes to 14 in. It's not too hard or too soft. Medium-plush describes this exactly. The two free pillows that come with it, though I wish they were king size, are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: david m teiman

customer_reviews.title: Very surprised how comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a $3000 Tempur-pedic for the last few years. Took a chance on this mattress because reviews were very good. I’m glad I did, this is so much more comfortable than a mattress that cost six times as much. I’ve been sleeping on it for a month now and I don’t even wanna get out of bed. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: John Capel

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and very well made.
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I seem to have is that it after getting on and off the bed the 14" mattress creeps over the side of the base and has to be pushed back on. I purchased the mattress and adjustable bed frame together, for health reasons, but the mattress is constantly sliding over the edge. The mattress is very comfortable as well as the bed, it's nice being able to sit in bed and read or watch television when my legs are bothering me and be able to position them to alleviate the discomfort. I would absolutely recommend this mattress but if you find a way to prevent the sliding please leave a reply. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Is not working out well for me.
customer_reviews.text: Soooooo damn. I was so excited for this mattress. I am 39 and have never had trouble sleeping. That is until I got this mattress. I have had lower back and hip pain which is causing me to limp around during the day. I called to find out how to return and the "expert" told me to bring to UPS. I tried to explain it's a queen mattress. She didnt get it. I will continue to call back because I cannot live like this. Not yet anyhow.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for big and tall
customer_reviews.text: I have been sleeping on this bed for two months now and I absolutely love it. It is my first memory foam mattress an I'm never going back. Its very comfortable and keeps it shape well. No sinking or deformations at this time, but I'll do a 6 month and year review in the future. I am 6ft tall and 250lbs. Only thing is that I have to have deep pocket sheets now. 14" is a lot of mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Rainey

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Background on me- 25 years old, former collegiate football player, chronic back pain from deteriorating disc and multiple stress fractures. It was normal for me to have to crack my back 20-30 times daily to get slight relief from the pain and discomfort I endured. Within a few days of getting this mattress my pain has nearly gone away and the need to crack my back has lessened significantly. I love the pillows that came with it and for the price I would have paid 10x what I did for the results this gave me. Highly recommend to ppl suffering low back pain!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I'm going to roll off!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this mattress. It's very soft and comfortable BUT has no side support, so it's not a good choice if you sit on your bed to put shoes on. I'm a slim female and I sink way down on it if I try to sit on the edge. Also, after sleeping on it for about a month, I noticed the side I sleep on is sinking, causing me to feel like I might roll off. I keep moving to the center to try to even it out, but it isn't working so I'm returning it. If you call Amazon, they will schedule a pick up, so you CAN return it if you don't like it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable mattress at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this mattress for 3 weeks now and so far I have no complaints. I purchased to replace a spring mattress that I have had for over 10 years. I was originally skeptical about buying a mattress online and looked at many different brands/reviews before choosing this one but I’m glad I did. The mattress does have an odor when opened that only lasts about 1-2 days but it was fully expanded within a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: My bf and i had been sleeping on his bed hes had for 10+ years that was so uncomfortable. We searched & did some research before we decided to go for this mattress. I can't tell you how happy i am that we did! I suffer from back pain and this helps tremendously! This mattress isn't too firm but it isn't too soft either, we both have gotten much better sleep with the mattress. 10/10 recommend this especially for such a cheap price. Also this is a thicker mattress so my normal queen sheets would slip off the corners, we just went to Walmart and bought jersey sheet sets that fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I upgraded to a queen because we didn't have enough space. Now we have plenty and this bed is great for his back. There is an intense smell which would not go away for days. I put baking soda and vacuumed it after a little while and that helped tremendously. The pillows it comes with are also great but they smell too. I would thoroughly air it our and do baking soda 1-3 times before you set the bed up. It does not sink nor does it make noise when we get up which is my boyfriend's favorite part. The mattress is very firm but not hard at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo M.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before choosing this mattress and I’m so glad I did. The cool gel is awesome, but can’t really be felt through even a thin mattress protector, so If you plan on using one; I wouldn’t even worry about the “cool gel” portion of the mattress. We use our mattress with an adjustable base and while it is thick, it still works well and is super comfortable. My little one isn’t even two and she loves taking naps in Mommy and Daddy’s bed. All three of us fall asleep fast and sleep all night with little to no movement. I cannot feel him when he moves either. This mattress far exceeded the expectations I had.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Horsley

customer_reviews.title: Can’t believe the awesome price
customer_reviews.text: For the price is unbelievable. I have needed a new mattress for my craftmatic bed for quite a while. Was so surprised to see a quality memory foam with gel at such a great price. Has been very comfortable, just had spinal fusion surgery and have been thankful every night I bought this mattress. Comes right to your door, just unpack and give room for it to grow as it enlarges in the air. Is heavy and awkward at full size so if possible let air on bed frame unless you have someone with muscles to move it in there after it has become full size.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi

customer_reviews.title: Was as stated
customer_reviews.text: Well I'll say I was impressed that it really is a comfortable bed. It was ready in less then 72 hrs but and my only BUT I smells mildewy, accordingly to packaging it was packed in 2018. It was shrink wraped with plenty of those silicone packages but seriously, it smells like mildew. I've put fabric softeners along with spraying fabreeze so hopefully that smell goes away. Other then smell, it's a decent mattress for the price. Hopefully, odor disapates or my review will change!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Way too soft
customer_reviews.text: Much too soft. When you want to 'roll out of bed' do not fret about speed as the edges of this mattress are so soft, when you do turn to get up, you'll find yourself on the floor faster then ants at a picnic! Not to mention the back pains. I thought it was just me, but my husband is also complaining about back and hip pains. We are both plus size people. So if you are of normal weight, this may be a great bed for you! But for us, I truly regret buying it and am sad over the waisted and lost $$.
customer_reviews.author: Kailuagirl27

customer_reviews.title: confused!
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately I have problem. I ordered two, because I have a split king adjustable bed. Happy with bed and one mattress. the second mattress was dirty, arrived without a box, only in plastic .I didnt think anything of it at the time. it never expanded to full size and when you got on it, it sunk down a lot. I ordered a replacement that I have not opened yet, because i do not have the ability to shrink it down to get it in the box that I received with the new mattress. Amazon can not help. I am waiting to hear from the company.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo D.

customer_reviews.title: Like sleeping on a rock!
customer_reviews.text: EXTREMELY FIRM. It’s like sleeping on the floor! Took me forever to fall asleep and I’m not a picky sleeper at all. Laying on my side caused some nasty shoulder pain when I woke up. I’m light (112 lbs) and I seriously don’t sink in AT ALL. My husband is 198 lbs and it’s better for him because he sinks in some... but we both agree it’s like a rock. Trying to see how to return the thing... Super disappointed:(. Also, it’s a warm summer night and the bed is quite warm... not sure how the cool gel works but not feeling anything special there either.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Initially Hard, but does soften after a few days.
customer_reviews.text: I write this after having slept on this for close to a month now. As others have said, initially it is rather hard, I was waking up sore from sleeping on it. I knew from other reviews that it should get better after a few nights. Thankfully it did, By the 4th night, I was no longer waking up sore from sleeping on it, and movement does not translate to your SO like other mattress. It is heavy, you are not going to install this easily by yourself if you are so inclined. As far as a noticeable odor that others have complained about, we didn't find what odor there was to be objectionable.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Do your research
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to write a personal review on this. I really wanted to like it. I ordered this after reading reviews and was hoping for a good mattress, but was let down. I'll start with some basics. I, to the best of my knowledge, have never had significant lower back problems until this mattress came into my life. I'm fit and by no means near overweight, Now it's a daily problem. After less than a month of use it has indentions and sink holes in it and it's hot, I mean this thing is hot to sleep in, but thanks for Amazon's stellar customer support, it's going back!
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hurt yourself
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this mattress. For what I paid I expected comfort. If you expect to wake up with back pain every day then maybe this mattress is for you. I wish I was joking however I am dead serious . this is the worst mattress I’ve ever owned in my entire life . I’ve owned it for sometime and I find myself sleeping on my couch as it is more comfortable. Sad but true. The only good thing were the two memory foam pillows. Also the mattress is too thick so naturally the sheets will not stay on like ever.
customer_reviews.author: B.L.Shatto

customer_reviews.title: I ordered too small.....NOT INTELLIGENT..........I should have gotten a FULL XL or a QUEEN size.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great mattress, but I invested in a FULL size when we should have ordered a FULL XL or a QUEEN size. We downsized homes where my husband's KING size bed would not fit in our new home's smaller bedrooms. I foolishly spent money on a FULL instead of a FULL XL....The mattress is nice. Indeed, get the 14" thick but get a FULL XL or QUEEN size for an adult. In fact, I'm giving this one to my grandchild and getting a QUEEN Serta set and a different bedframe. His feet hang off the end of this one...LMBO......The webs we weave...LOL. My fault.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Badea

customer_reviews.title: Insomia
customer_reviews.text: I have had a Tempur pedic mattress for 16 years and it had broke down very bad, and it cost me 1500.00. So all I can say is I just decided to try this mattress for the price, and I looked at a whole lot of mattress's. I dearly love this mattress it stays cool and and is a little softer than my old one. I did let it fully fill out for 4 days before using it. I believe it really does need that much time, I measured it every day and it took that long to reach 14". I would recommend this mattress to anyone!!!!
customer_reviews.author: P. Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Snoring relief?
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a new mattress. We got 7 years out of a traditional king size mattress set. Spent 7 years flipping and turning. We have another home and our bedding there is awesome - Denver mattress. So, why spend a ton of $ here for a few years. Well, I truly think that this cool gel comfort foam mattress is actually responsible for my husband not snoring at night. I don't know if I sleep better because of the mattress or because he doesn't snore. May have to get this mattress is my other home or ship it with us when we finally move. I just hope its holds up.
customer_reviews.author: JerseyAJ

customer_reviews.title: Cool gel? No way. Misleading name. HOT HOT HOT. Not comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress as wanted to switch from queen to king. I was looking for something that will be cool as I tend to get hot. Well in my climate my nights are 59-62F , windows open, and I wake up SWEATING along my back. Also at first it felt ok but now I routinely get up with lower back pain. I guess the only plus is that it did expand unlike my other mattress from another brand that never fully expanded. next time I will just go to the store, pay more but get a comfort guarantee.
customer_reviews.author: chilanzar

customer_reviews.title: I'm hot now when I sleep
customer_reviews.text: I have the medium plush king. Even though its A million times better than my last mattress, in my opinion its too soft. Since I've had this bed, I've never been so hot when I sleep.I thought cool gel would literally hold up to its name, but I've had to sleep with an extra fan on me or I wake up drenched in sweat and I've never had that problem before. It fluffed up perfectly, looks very nice, full 14" all around. but I'm hot as hell now. I literally woke up out my sleep to write this because I was so hot. But other that feeling like it retains heat while I sleep its a good mattress
customer_reviews.author: Cdwill

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: If I can give this zero stars I would, I worked in the mattress industry for 9 years . i understand construction, materials and how they are made. The inconsistency and feel of the mattress in different areas is mind blowing, out of the box we had to fight uphill from a depression on both sides. The density of the foam is different in every part of the bed. Perhaps it’s a one of quality issue, perhaps not. I asked what can be done and Amazon customer service was awesome, the refunded immediately and only drawback was Inhad to get rid of mattress on my own, not a big deal. I would just say buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Steve F.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing price for an amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I'm sleeping on a $4,000 dollar bed.. I can't believe we got is so cheap. I am super picky about my mattresses. I like super-duper firm beds because it feels better on my back. (For me,, if it's not firm enough, then the first 10 minutes in the morning, my back is mildly sore/stiff until I start moving around).. but this bed is soft, yet firm and I wake up with no back discomfort. I finally get to enjoy a soft bed like normal people. Yay! On a side note, you will need deep fitted sheets, it's 13 inches deep. And the 2 free pillows are really nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron S.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money. Pick the version you want based on firmness
customer_reviews.text: First week was a little more firm than I was expecting. I got the medium firm version (2.0). I do like a somewhat soft bed and I still found it comfortable. It has gotten much better. I'm 130 lbs and my dachshund sleep on it. The bed supports me but doesn't sink under small pressure points like a hand as you support your self on and off the bed or moving around. For the price I'm super happy. I waited the full 72 hours just because I didn't want to take any chances changing the foam and how it expands.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Its alright for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice mattress. Definitely better than what we had. We got the pillows that came with the mattress as a bundle. The pillows are horrible. They are so thick no normal person could use them comfortably. If you're a side sleeper you'll need shoulders the size of Dwayne Johnson to use the pillows. We threw them in the garbage. I'm still on the fence on if I'm hot sleeping in the bed. We just changed the sheets to a different brand so I'll update once I figure out if it's the mattress or the new sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie Morales

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, Quality and Great Sleep!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mattress and the price only compliments it. I haven’t slept this well in years. The comfort level is amazing. It is not too firm but not soft at all, it is dense and plush. There is zero transfer motion. This mattress was delivered promptly, easy to unwrap and was fully decompressed by 24 hrs. I never noticed any odor in which I have read from many other reviewers. I did buy the Zinus 14in Elite Smartbase to accompany it along with the Utopiamattress protector which were great buys as well. I would definitely recommend this mattress. I feel sorry for people that go out and spend thousands and get less.
customer_reviews.author: Lana French

customer_reviews.title: Firm means firm
customer_reviews.text: First I must say that My husband is ok with our new matress. Covid has made it to high risk to go out to try a matress. I had to have a new matress and went with the amount of 4 and 5 stars on the reviews. The matress set up just fine and there was no un pleasant smell. The overall appearance is quite copasetic. I just find it very firm with hardly any give and my back feels no more relief than before. So If you like a firm bed this mattress is for you!
customer_reviews.author: Forrestersmate

customer_reviews.title: For the price, A+ mattress
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this mattress on a whim because of my failing spring mattress. Got the 14” one which is plenty high. Shipping took a bit long, around one and a half weeks. Once the mattress arrived and I unpacked it, it was vacuum sealed and took less than 2 hours to completely inflate to 14”. Slept on it day one and it is awesome! I’ve read that it could take at least 2 weeks for the mattress to completely settle in, so I’m still waiting on that. However, for the price it’s a pretty top notch deal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Best bed we have in our house now.
customer_reviews.text: This bed arrived fast! Not only did we get it in 2 days but the pictures you see were taken immediately after we unwrapped it. Plus it came with 2 amazing pillows. We bought this cheaper mattress for our son. Now we want one for ourselves. It beats our $2k sealy bed hands down!!! It doesn’t smell. No stains. Packaged nice. I don’t know what else to say. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: MeganCW

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Where do I start? Soft yet firm enough. We bought twin XL for our adjustable king bed. We exchanged the $750 mattress that the bed store recommended for this $300 mattress. This mattress exceeds the more expensive one in quality and comfort. I just can't say enough about this mattress. My sleep has improved as well. Just awesome! I LOVE THIS MATTRESS.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Customer

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: Queen 14 inch deep 2.0 cool gel -Most comfortable thing I have ever laid on. Total game changer. Zipper to cover came apart from frequent adjusting mattress on frame while changing sheets. will be sewing bottom back on for permanent stability. Best. Sleep. Ever. 12+hours with no back pain. 💕 don't waste money on temperpedic!
customer_reviews.author: Eli June

customer_reviews.title: Really loving this bed.
customer_reviews.text: Being impatient I had to lie down on this bed after a few hours. My first thought was OMG this is to soft. Gave it 24 hours and it had firmed up and it is now perfect Firm yet soft enough. After sleeping on it for 6 weeks I'm really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: simon wilson

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: My husband calls this "The bed that will ruin you..." for any other one. It cradles you and supports. I love it. I have scoliosis, spinal stinosis, fibromyalgia and titanium spacers and plates up my spine. I wake up most mornings not hurting, and I AM LOVING IT. I am short and fat, hubby is TALL and broad. We have a queen size, it is GLORIOUS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mystsin

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable with the right amount of support
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an aging mattress with this one and am glad I did. My old mattress had lost its support for my middle back, and so I frequently woke up with minor back pain. After using this mattress for several months, I wanted to write a review for it-so others could determine if it was right for them. First, if you are looking for a memory foam mattress that can be used on an adjustable platform this works just fine. Secondly, if you like some support, but still have the softness of memory foam this one works well. Finally, if you like sleeping on your side occasionally, this one seems to fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: ceramicbrad

customer_reviews.title: Awful bed super hot and hard as a rock
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I bought 3 different mattresses all different brands from amazon at the same time and this was by far the worst I wake up and my body hurts my head hurts and I am up 100 times a night this bed is hard as a rock and sleeps so hot I can’t even use a blanket I would never buy this again I have given it plenty of time to get used to and it is not working out so I will be checking to see if I can return the bed
customer_reviews.author: MaryBeth

customer_reviews.title: 2.0 is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried the 2.0 would be too plush but it totally isn’t! It really is perfect. It is the right amount of firm. I might even add a thin topper if I feel like I want a little more plushness but it’s a good compromise with my husband who prefers firm. The king was such a good price. We upgraded from our queen zinus green tea 12” and I prefer the cool gel much more! We are very hot sleepers and noticed no issues with overheating, too. 5/5!
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: 1.0 is worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Opened it and immediately grabbed the pillow and flipped over to correct side. I played with the cover a little around the corners. Adjusted the covers and all my corners came up perfect. Not sagging anywhere. That cover is a little lose before it’s expanded all the way which makes since. Just fix the edges while it’s coming up and shouldn’t have any issues. _ the smell. Very faint. Just smells like something new. Others complaining about it to me just looking for something to complain about. It’s Very faint. Definitely buy again. I have 5 herniated disks and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: 2.0 Model - Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I did not see many reviews for the King sized 2.0 model and so wanted to leave one of my own now that we've slept on our bed for the last 5 months. We love it! Great quality for the price. My spouse and I both agree its not too firm and not too soft. The pillows it comes with suck, but the bed itself is really great. We bought new pillows and have slept great. We've recommended to friends and family looking for a comfortable bed that wont break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Weston Albers

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mattress.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never written a review before but this mattress definitely deserves it. It helps me sleep through the night. Barely toss and turn since the purchase. I bought the king size mattress and the box it comes in is very heavy so if you are planning in purchasing the king size bed Please make sure that there is 2-3 people who can bring the box in. Once you open it it fills up fully in a matter of 2 hours. I know the company recommended that we wait 24 hours before sleeping it, we didn’t. We slept on it 4 hours after opening and haven’t had any issue. Thickness is the full 14 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is fantastic (with one exception). We purchased another recently and wanted one slightly softer. This is slightly softer, but not soft. I was shocked at some of the pictures that the mattress did not return to form. Once you cut into the packaging and it begins to reform, we barely had time to get the plastic off before it was 95%. This is really comfortable, but I'm still noticing some hip pain I had hoped a bit softer mattress would assist with. This is our second of this brand and we really liked both.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: BEST MATTRESS EVER and slot cheaper.
customer_reviews.text: I am 80 years young and it is the best mattress I ever had. Had open heart surgery last year, have not slept well at all since. First night on my memory foam gel 2 I slept all night and every night since. I finally feel healed from my surgery, also full of energy because of good rest. I would highly recommend this mattress.. Took about half an hour to set up frame and mattress on it! Don't even have a box spring under it, just heavy duty frame and bed skirt over it
customer_reviews.author: Lynda C Merle

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress!
customer_reviews.text: I had searched several mattress over the last few months... my issue was quality that matched the price. I read a lot of reviews and decided to give this one a try. I just received my mattress earlier today. It expanded quickly and nicely. I haven’t slept on it yet but I laid on it and to my surprise it was firmer that I had imagined. I’m overall pleased with my purchase. It’s a great value and comparable to my old Tempur-pedic. Excited to sleep on it!
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Worst mattress I've ever slept on. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: I wake up every morning wishing I bought something else. I'm in pain until about an hour after I'm up and moving. I think I'm going to start sleeping on the floor with the dogs until I can save up ebought to buy a mattress that doesn't make me wake up at the edge of back cramps in each side of my spine. I hate this mattress. I hate it.
customer_reviews.author: patrick welch

customer_reviews.title: The very Best mattress!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bed! It's my second memory foam mattress this one is a much better quality! The cool technology is far superior to the last one. I sleep so comfortably! I was concerned that the 14" would be over kill, but honestly it is fantastic! I totally recommend this mattress!
customer_reviews.author: mylois

customer_reviews.title: Not a good mattress
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this matress the middle of 2017, I'm barely home due to work so it's not like it's slept on everyday and the matress is literally splitting apart and seems like it doesn't support me or my fiance anymore. It's so uncomfortable now that we have been putting blankets on the floor and sleeping on that until I'm able to go through my warranty. If I was able to give this 0 stars I would. It says there's a 10 year warranty but nobody's helped me yet.
customer_reviews.author: John P

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable and supportive mattress ever!
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable and supportive mattress I've ever slept 😴 on. I purchased this for my bedroom when I moved because the Kluft California King I was using before didn't fit in the Master Bedroom well. I waited the recommended 72 hours to sleep on the new mattress after it was roled out and placed on the platform box spring. I've slept on much more expensive mattresses backed by big brand names. This one is the winner. The price is profoundly low considering the quality. Thank you 😊
customer_reviews.author: Anna B

customer_reviews.title: Painful mattress
customer_reviews.text: I really dislike this mattress. We have been sleeping on it for almost a year and it just gets more uncomfortable! I’m usually a side sleeper but can’t ever get comfortable. The mattress is way too plush and I usually like softer mattresses. If I sleep on my back I wake up shortly after with a pins/needles feeling all up and down my body from where it’s been touching the mattress like how you feel when your leg falls asleep from pressure. Just really not great- very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: B pez

customer_reviews.title: Mattress is amazing. More firm than "medium firm" as stated
customer_reviews.text: Matters is amazing. More firm than "medium firm" as stated. This thing grew to actual size as soon as unwrapped. Slept on it the first night. I get out of bed and my other half does not feel a thing. Bought an adjustable bed for it and it's perfe t. Cool gel doesn't work for me but that's an individual situation. Overall it's a great buy for the price. 2 months later and it's no different than day 1. Happy purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Wickedro

customer_reviews.title: The Smell..
customer_reviews.text: I had heard that memory foam mattresses can smell and that giving them time to air out is necessary. After almost two months the smell has not gone away.. even after leaving windows open excessively and putting it on the porch one windy day. I continued to try to work with it for so long because it is comfortable and has been great a relieving back and shoulder pain. It is also warmer than my old mattress. I tried a synthetic waterproof mattress protector and had to switch to a normal mattress pad after waking up soaked in sweet a couple of times. Amazon was very generous with their return policy with something I could not re-box.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Christiansen

customer_reviews.title: READ THIS BEFORE RETURNING!
customer_reviews.text: I slept on this one night and it felt so soft. Like in mud as some reviews state. I need a firm mattress with a soft feel on top. So the next morning I removed everything and inspected and read. Seems the bottom layer is the firm support layer. The top layer you could mash with your finger. I turned the entire mattress over and put the cover on it and presto - problem solved. Quite firm with a soft layer on top. Will keep you updated - hope this saves you from mushy sleepy nights!
customer_reviews.author: cb54

customer_reviews.title: Good supportive mattress
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable mattress. We have been using it for about 2 months. My wife has suffered from low back pain for several years. She awoke one morning shortly after we got this mattress with no pain. Pain has not returned! It provides a firm, yet comfortable sleeping surface. It is firmer than some mattresses, it takes a little getting used to. We are average - to slightly above average weight, and it provides good support. I will probably get another one of these when we redo the other bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a king-size replacement for a full-size Serta mattress purchased in a brick-and-mortar for far more money. Buying a mattress online was daunting because of the variety out there, but I’m glad I went with this model and couldn’t be happier. It comes in a relatively small but kind of heavy box; I cut the cardboard away carefully then then followed the instructions on unpacking which is basically to place it and carefully cut back the plastic wrap. It’ll unfurl quickly and mine seemed to be at ~70-80% normal size within a few hours. I gave it a full 48 hours before sleeping on it and it has been excellent every night since.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Marcantonio

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best!
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars all the way around!! The mattress arrived earlier than the estimated delivery date. It was VERY HEAVY! My husband and I wrestled it into the house and popped it open in the living room for a full 24 hours while we waited for the delivery of our adjustable base. Once the base came, we set everything up and fell in love. There was no smell, as mentioned by some other reviews, and it’s the perfect mix of soft and firm! My husband and I are both “bigger” people and we don’t roll into a pit. Actually, neither of us felt the other even so much as move all night. We are very happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed. It’s firm and soft! Delivery was quick. I ordered Wednesday evening it was delivered Saturday morning. I’m so happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Candy Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: Great mattress for the price. It can get warm and it took a couple days to loose the odor. I put a water proof cover on it and If it’s not on I notice the warmth. But I’ve bought 3 of these and I’m happy with them. Not sure why the queen is more expensive than the king. We are smaller people so I am not too worried about indentation but if you rotate the bed top to bottom every 6 months it shouldn’t indent.
customer_reviews.author: robin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable mattress
customer_reviews.text: We received the mattress on time and packed properly. It expanded to the correct size and thickness within a day. We let it "rest" for seven days before using it. It is very comfortable and is not too firm. However, after only a couple of .months, we can tell it's going to break down quickly. It seems there are already "divots" where we sleep. It's comfortable for now and inexpensive. Probably worth buying and using it for a couple years.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Very cool and comfortable for larger people
customer_reviews.text: When I was shopping for this a friend mentioned that for larger people (over 200) it is recommended that they get a thicker mattress so I bought this 14" memory foam with cool gel. I've been very satisfied with this mattress. It opened and went to full size with 2-4 hours, and there was no smell at all that I noticed. The cool gel works because I have not felt the heat that can come with memory foam mattresses. You do need to get sheets with big corner pockets, but it is well worth that additional cost. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Masters

customer_reviews.title: Not "cool," not cool at all.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because of the "cooling" properties the description boasted of. I read all the reviews and took a chance. I can't stand this bed. I sleep with the windows open since it's below 40 F outside, and I can't really get a decent night sleep until it's below 60 in my room, or I'll wake up at 2 am, drenched in sweat. I'm a girl in my early 30's and I'm a healthy/slightly overweight size. I sink so bad and it's just getting worse.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lay

customer_reviews.title: Dreamy
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this bed. We bought it because we bought one for my daughter and it completely changed her sleeping...longer, deeper sleep with less tossing and turning. I am a side sleeper and usually my hip hurts from this but since getting this bed I haven't had that issue. It did take probably a good 2/3 days for my body to adjust to the new mattress but after that...dreamy :)
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This item exceeded our expectations! It is important to know that you must not sleep on it for the first three days after opening or you will void your warranty and the mattress may not perform correctly. It is really amazing. We purchased a king size and the size was perfect. I think this will be the only mattress we will purchase in the future
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable! Highly recommend over competitors and great price
customer_reviews.text: Have had this mattress for a few weeks now and absolutely love it! It fully expanded after about 8 hours and was actually a lot thicker than expected. Super comfortable! Stays cool. Need deep edge sheets for full coverage. You can place this mattress strait on a bed frame without a box spring. Give it a few nights to get completely used to it. My fiancé did not like it the first few nights but now his back and neck pain is completely gone and he sleeps sound through the whole night! Great price and product. Would definitely recommend and hopefully it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Willhoite

product_meta.title: Classic Brands Cool Gel 1.0 Ultimate Gel Memory Foam 14-Inch Mattress with BONUS 2 Pillows , Queen, White
product_meta.description: Style:Cool Gel 1.0 Mattress| Size:QueenExperience cloud-like luxury with our Classic Brands cool Gel Ultimate gel memory foam 14- inch mattress. This mattress offers a plusher and incredibly comfortable sleeping surface. Starting with a whopping 2-inch top layer, which consists of breathable ventilated cool gel memory foam that conforms to your shape and has a faster recovery factor than conventional memory foam. A second layer of 2-inch memory foam works with the 2-inch comfort foam support providing you with the ultimate sleeping experience. The 8-inch base layer maintains the strength and effectiveness of the layers. Know the size and height of your mattress ahead of purchase to make sure you are ordering the correct size. Keep in mind that you should combine the height of your bed frame, foundation, or adjustable bed base with the height of your mattress to get an approximate idea. Our advanced packaging technology means we can roll-pack our mattresses and ship them at one-third of the normal size. A mattress that is roll-packed still retains its initial quality, as each will quickly recover and return to its original shape when opened. Look for more innovative specialty sleep products from Classic Brands. Our mattresses are CertiPUR-US Certified. Certified flexible polyurethane foams have been independently laboratory tested.
feature_bullets: Premium pressure-relieving memory foam and high-density aerated cool gel memory foam are combined together to provide the essential support and comfort for a deeper night's sleep
Beautifully tailored and detailed with a stretch knit fabric cover with waterfall edge and matching knit side panels

Gel infused ventilated memory foam creates a plush and comfortable sleeping surface for a more restful night's sleep; high-density base foam relieves pressure points and conforms to your body, and provides unparalleled support during the night

High-quality memory foam conforms to your body while the cool gel regulates temperature; memory foam is naturally hypoallergenic and resistant to allergens, mold, bacteria, and is CertiPUR-US program standards for performance, emissions, and durability
Medium-Plush Feel with Firm Support and Adjustable Base Friendly; 10 Year Warranty
BONUS 2-Shredded Memory Foam Standard Pillows FREE!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars9,911 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Cool Gel Ultimate Gel Memory Foam 14-Inch Mattress with BONUS 2 Pillows, Queen
